text: Fleur Adcock (10 February 1934 â€“ 10 October 2024) was a New Zealand poet and editor. Adcock lived much of her life in England. Her works focused on New Zealand poetry anthologies. She was awarded an OBE in 1996 for her works to New Zealand literature. In 2008 she was made a Companion of the New Zealand Order of Merit. Adcock died from a short-illness in London, England on 10 October 2024, at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2024 deaths Category:New Zealand poets Category:Editors
title: Fleur Adcock
